website_summaries.verdict: Hands down the best deal available for aquarium enthusiasts who want to decorate their tanks on a budget.
pros: A value-priced pack of 3 artificial plants
More than 10-inches tall – provides coverage for fish, and an affordable way to decorate an aquarium
Many consumers report happy fish "hanging out" around them
cons: A bit flimsy and fake looking
Plant bases don't provide enough weight for all aquariums, but covering them in gravel helps
A few issues of green coloring fading in water

customer_reviews.title: SUPER TOXIC!
customer_reviews.text: STAY AWAY! I should have followed my gut when I noticed the package come directly from China. I washed the plants off several times before placing them in my tank. The next day, all but one of my fish survived!!! SUPER toxic. My kids were devastated as was I.
customer_reviews.author: bosco

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you want this or you will be stuck with it
customer_reviews.text: Product wouldn’t stand up how I wanted it to. Thought they would stand straight up as it looked in the picture. I requested a return but seller asked for a picture. I sent a picture and seller still didn’t send me my refund. He just asked more questions. Make sure this is what you want or you will be stuck with it
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Love these plants, perfect for my betta tanks.
customer_reviews.text: I love these plants. They are perfect for my betta aquariums. I don't keep rocks in my betta aquariums because I like to clean the bottom of the tanks with my small fine net everyday after they eat. These plants still stand up nice and flow nice with the water. I definitely would recommend. I have taken a picture of my reserve tank with extra water when I need it. A few of my tank I use for decorative purposes only and reserve water. I do keep rocks in my reserve water tanks.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Good product better price
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly what it says it is in the description. The product is good quality and looks just like the picture. It provides great hiding places for your fish and really makes your tank stand out. Plus the price of this item is easily 70% cheaper than at pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in turtle tank
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my turtle tank. I used them to cover my turtles basking platform pvc legs, and give it some anchoring points. Works like a charm and (so far) they seem to leave it alone. Other artificial plants have been torn apart by my 2 turtles in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for hiding...
customer_reviews.text: What's to complain about? Nothing. These are long and actually float at the top a little but I like the effect. They stay stationary at the bottom though. I have the 3 together fanned out behind a large temple. Looks really nice. The fish love darting in and out and hiding. One spends most of her time hanging out in them.
customer_reviews.author: PURPLES

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for 3pcs!
customer_reviews.text: They are the size I expected. Not top line quality, but a 3 pack which is always great! They are flimsy so if they are placed in an area of the tank, make sure to place items next to it to help keep it in place. There is a small weight on each of the plants.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie07

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very realistic and good quality product. Very impressed. Update: after two days of being in my tank the white paint is causing my tank to turn milky. Very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: michael H.

customer_reviews.title: These are a nice bright green
customer_reviews.text: I like them very much, great color, and exactly as pictured. Worth the wait. The weights could be a bit heavier, but they are sufficient in flowing water to stay put. They do move in the water current, so they look realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal W.Top Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Took longer than planned to get
customer_reviews.text: Too forever to get them. Almost forgot that I ordered them it took so long. They are tall and work just fine. Wash in dishwasher to make sure they didn't have any chemicals them before using in the tank
customer_reviews.author: Superbeckee

customer_reviews.title: They are very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: They are very good for the price, don't expect them to be like real plants, but they do sit at the bottom of the tank and wave with the motion of the filter, no problems with my fish, I soaked them overnight in a quickstart and water. Pleased at the price!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Cochran

customer_reviews.title: SATISFIED CUSTOMER
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to decorate some bowls I have and I am very pleased. Make sure to give them a good rinse, just in case. Pros: look exactly as advertised, good condition, pretty Cons: they do ship from China, so it took a few weeks to arrive, but would still order again.
customer_reviews.author: Topsi Kretts

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected. I soaked them in rainwater for 5 days before planting. The fish are enjoying them just fine 10 days later. They are gambusia though. I bought these with a bunch of other plants on Amazon. I'm pleased to say they seem to have no toxic properties.
customer_reviews.author: DC Agar

customer_reviews.title: They are well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go with the taco bear 20 inch plant they are identical as the the other but not as tall which is what I wanted perfect for a 55 gallon and they don’t float soak them in a little vinegar water first they do have a slight smell but not as bad as some say rinse with water and they are ready to go in made my tiger barbs happy 😊
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: so-so
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy, the branches are pretty loose compared to another kind I purchased. These took so long to ship I forgot I ordered them. Once in my tank they didn't stand up straight bc the branches were to heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was wanting ! I did read some not so good reviews about this product, but what I received looks exactly like the picture! I am very Happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekahh Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to get my new fish tank it will look absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.author: A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: great for plastic
customer_reviews.text: These plants are slightly configurable. You can make them taller and shorter buy using different little sections off of other segments. I made some realllllllly tall ones so that it would act as floating cover in my 20ga tank. Wash easy at waterchanges
customer_reviews.author: farcow

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: (On the right in the photo) these do their job, and are a good medium height plant. They don't move very freely like some of my taller plants but they help balance out the plants in my aquarium.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: For the price, you can't beat these
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't beat these. They are really nice, and look great in my tank. The only issue I had was they were semi bent when I received them, but they're straightening out in the tank fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nick R.

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: They look pretty in the tank and you can cut it to adjust the height to fit your tank. Easy to stay upright with the weight on the bottom without having to bury it.
customer_reviews.author: Mira Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality artificial decorations
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality artificial decorations. Been in my saltwater tank now for about 4-5 months, no issues so far. They look real and dont droop on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Conlon

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Remember, you get what you pay for. That being said these plants are excellent for the price. No issues. I ordered a total of six plants, so two orders of three, they filled out my aquarium nicely and will work great until I find other ones. The only drawback would be waiting three to four weeks for the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: dna

customer_reviews.title: Bought this & was totally disappointed. Came wrapped in plastic & looked great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this & was totally disappointed. Came wrapped in plastic & looked great. Took out of the wrapper & stood them up...they flopped over in the middle & would not stand up straight. Thought maybe they need to be in the tank to stand straight. Nope they flopped over. Returned with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L.

customer_reviews.title: Plants would look great if they were not shipped to me FOLDED in ...
customer_reviews.text: Plants would look great if they were not shipped to me FOLDED in half for packaging. After a week they still look 'bent over' in my tank.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are very inexpensive! They are actually over 10 inches tall. One of the best deals I have found for taller aquarium plants!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good seller A+++
customer_reviews.text: They are attractive, look natural, price was right. Cannot ask for more. Good seller A+++
customer_reviews.author: Karl W. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in the tank
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the tank. The weights on the plants should be heavier, they can bounce around if they are not placed into gravel.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lesk

customer_reviews.title: cheap and thin
customer_reviews.text: these plants do not look anything like the picture. they are very thin. plus,they were folded in half and shoved in a bag. very difficult to straighten them out.
customer_reviews.author: disney lover

customer_reviews.title: Add some green !
customer_reviews.text: Nice fake plants looks great and fish love them !
customer_reviews.author: mary beth martinez

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not great but pretty hard to beat for the price. At this price I can just replace them regularly to keep things looking great instead of having to try and scrub them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Arsee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: They look good and light up under uv hood lights. I would buy them again. I gave 4 stars because I wish the bases were a wider disc shape so they had more stone holding em down. Kept knocking them around vacuuming but I stuck them as deep as possible and so far so good. If I hit them again I'd hang them by the top of their leaves and hang by the weights for a few days to take out the folded shape they took during shipping
customer_reviews.author: AntAPD

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and much bigger than I expected, which made me like them a lot more
customer_reviews.author: Payton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love these plants. They were a little short for my 55 gallon tank, but my fish can still hide behind it. They are very colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Niece

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: It's better than I expected, the plastic used for it is soft enough that I don't worry about my fish scraping against it and hurting themselves.
customer_reviews.author: ariana brathwaite

customer_reviews.title: Looking good!
customer_reviews.text: The "plants" arrived folded in half in the package, which concerned me. However, they float up from their base, so the bend goes away. They look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Steve11235

customer_reviews.title: Great plans for aquarium
customer_reviews.text: Added great color and depth to the tank. Have had about 6 months and is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive
customer_reviews.text: Deceptive. The middle strand from each one was removed. I received three, 3-strand plants. I'm using them for a project and now don't have enough. I paid $5.99. Not happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: music lover

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to arrive from overseas and when it did, poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Looks real
customer_reviews.text: Base needs to be a little heavier to stay in place. I have some current in my fish tank. Other than that all good
customer_reviews.author: Mike Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the tank and is an excellent bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Romney

customer_reviews.title: My fishies love these
customer_reviews.text: My fishies love these! I ended up going with a planted tank, but when these were in my tank they made a great hiding spot!
customer_reviews.author: ARFedewa

customer_reviews.title: Nice item, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice addition to my freshwater tank, and a good mid-range price.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Ferrer-Orta

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price, they look good and flow nicely in the tank. Update, plants came off base in less than a week
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: REALISTIC AQUARIUM FLORA
customer_reviews.text: This is a repeat purchase of Uxcell plastic aquarium plants. Very pleased with their realistic look. They are soft and don't injur fish. Love the brand, purchasing and shipping experience.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gower

customer_reviews.title: Very nice aquarium plants.
customer_reviews.text: Nice aquarium plants. They don’t feel cheap or like they’re going to fall apart. Color is good as well. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine J Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sushi, our beta, Loves to swim around these photo plants. Sometimes, even likes to rest on top of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim G.

customer_reviews.title: A+ seller
customer_reviews.text: Item was just as described. And seller was quick to deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi Coe

customer_reviews.title: A+ seller
customer_reviews.text: Item was just as described. And seller was quick to deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi Coe

customer_reviews.title: Fit in nicely with small aquarium
customer_reviews.text: I felt my fish needed more places to chill in our 20 gallon tank. They seem to enjoy going around these plants .
customer_reviews.author: smartgrl

customer_reviews.title: Good plastic plant
customer_reviews.text: Plastic plants exactly as described. I like the heavy weight at the bottom to hold the plant down
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice little artificial plants for my fish tank. Enhances the background beautifully. Great value at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Best artificial plants ive bought
customer_reviews.text: Best artificial plants ive bought. The base is heavy. The branches & leaves are softer than most makes them look more real
customer_reviews.author: Sharon. M

customer_reviews.title: Bright color
customer_reviews.text: Very bright green color, not a natural color, but I like it as an addition to my tank. It was a better price than I could have gotten for the same type at my local store.
customer_reviews.author: CD Davis

customer_reviews.title: Looks Amazing in my Tank!
customer_reviews.text: These decorations look very good in my tank. They are very bright in color and are a little transparent which gives them a very unique look. Looks very good in sand as well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: The plants were shipped folded over so they have a bend to them. The base is a nice weight so they won't have issues coming out of place. For the price its a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Dienne M Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love these artificial plants
customer_reviews.text: Love these artificial plants. They brighten up our tank. The tops of the leaves move gently, producing a very calming effect overall. The fish seem to love them just as much too.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product that looks and feels real. I like that it has the weights on the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Cormier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my fish like these, they look good in my tank
customer_reviews.author: FLO H.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for a great price. Not your typical plastic plant but the texture and build of the plants make them look real.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: These finally arrived... they are a little thinner than I was expecting and I don't like the white base, but I'll bury the base in the sand and hopefully they will look ok.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look great but slightly greasy, requires cleaning before putting in tank.
customer_reviews.author: Michol

customer_reviews.title: Good looking artificial plants
customer_reviews.text: Great looking artificial plants, and a great size for our 50 gallon tank. The fish seem to like them and it has made the tank more attractive
customer_reviews.author: nathan m rohda

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted and ordered, very reasonably priced ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and ordered, very reasonably priced and came very quickly after I ordered it. Would definitely order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for a nice price
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure how these were going to look in my new tank but they look great. Just what you need if you have a taller tank. Hard to find tall pieces.
customer_reviews.author: T Rod

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just your average plastic plantnothing fancy, Which is what I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Decent but look super fake
customer_reviews.text: Theyre good, long but they look really fake. Soak in hot water to make them look more realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I got these three for the same price as one from the pet store.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Lush and green
customer_reviews.text: These aquarium plants look great in my 29-gallon community tank! They are realistic and lush. I like how full they are and the color is a vibrant green. I feel like they are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: EricaJ527

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth THe Money!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in tank!!!! And great bang for the buck???

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality plants at a good price. They look great.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking plants
customer_reviews.text: Great looking aquarium plants. They look nice on the back wall to help hide all of the cords and filters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: These plants made a nice addition to my established aquarium. They are not very full though, but they are a great value for the price. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Renee J.

customer_reviews.title: Have ordered 5 sets like them allot give a poo of color in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered 5 sets like them allot give a poo of color in a tank of fish that would eat live plants

customer_reviews.title: Terrific buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, I swap out fish plants often and soak and scrub the others, then return them when I clean the tank again. Terrific buy!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very soft so they float around rather then stand straight up in the tank.

customer_reviews.title: Fresh looking
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a couple sets of these and our fish babies love to hide out in them.
customer_reviews.author: K.Peterson

customer_reviews.title: It's a little "light - thin" feeling. You pay ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a little "light - thin" feeling. You pay for what you get. It's ok, I'll still use it in my 50 gal tank.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product just the right fullness and the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: great product just the right fullness and the fact that you can group them all together or spread them apart makes it really fun to use
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Nice Color, you can make them longer if you want, Rinsed and soaked them 12 hours before putting in aquarium. have not had any problems.

customer_reviews.title: weighted at the bottom and the fish seem to like them.
customer_reviews.text: They are green, plastic, weighted at the bottom and the fish seem to like them.

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: They are great priced, however it isn't a challenge to tell they are fake. Not a big deal tho, as both my fish and shrimp love them.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks wonderful in tank along with several other brands/types of faux plants! Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: tall and nice to have with fry to hide in.
customer_reviews.text: nice addition and useful for my fry to hide in.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean, and aren't sharp on the leaves. my Betta loves them!! Had them for 4 months and had no problems.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what my tanks needed! Came fast too! Very pleased

customer_reviews.text: My betta likes to sit near the top in between the leaves.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the plants. Brightened up the tank and look really pretty. Sent quickly and packaged well. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: E. Likes

customer_reviews.title: Bought for our 3 gallon betta tank. Elvis is ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 3 gallon betta tank. Elvis is a fan but I wish they were a little stiffer so the weren't so spidery all over the tank.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price and overall great product
customer_reviews.text: It's plastics stands well, great steel for the price.. it's cheaper than going to any store even Walmart.

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Slow shipping BUT these plants are soft and hardy. They straight up are better than the more expensive plants I have in my tank.

customer_reviews.title: Make a great addition to my betta tank
customer_reviews.text: Make a great addition to my betta tank. I did trim them a little as they are quite tall. Easy to clean and put in the tank. They only stand up when you add water.

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my 10 gallon fish tank
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my 10 gallon fish tank. nice height, looks pretty, and am very satisfied with it. The snails like to go on them too.

customer_reviews.title: Goooood
customer_reviews.text: Super. Rapid shipping good materials for my fish . easy to clean. I fully satisfy.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: good for the price but very lightweight that mine all sit on the bottom of the aquarium

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy and adds color to my tank. I would not hesitate in buying additional products in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These look nice. They’re tall and a little flowy. They’re a nice shade of green. They look realistic.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the aquarium
customer_reviews.text: These are plastic plants, but they don't look super fake. They look nice in thetank, I have them in the back and kind of hiding the filter tube. I like them.

customer_reviews.title: Betta fish loves it
customer_reviews.text: My betta fish loves them! I did have to trim it down a bit to fit in my 5 gallon tank but they look amazing in the tank.

customer_reviews.title: Adds Quality
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I thoughts, but add a lot of quality to the tank. Actually, I liked how large they came because I just cut them down to the size I wanted with scissors. I will buy again after these cycle through.

product_meta.title: uxcell Aquarium Fish Tank Green Plastic Artificial Plants 10.6inch High 3Pcs
product_meta.description: Size:10.6"Description: An ideal decoration for your fish tank with this lifelike ornament. Suitable for both fresh and salt water, no-toxic and easy for daily washing. Design with ceramic base for stand steady. Compared with natural plants, it will not go rot, more beautiful and attractive.
feature_bullets: Color: Green; Size: 27 x 3cm; Package Content: 3 x Aquarium Plastic Plants
Product Name: Aquarium Plastic Plant; Material: Plastic
Base Size: 3.5 x 2.1cm / 1.28" x 0.83" (L*W); Water Type: freshwater / saltwater
Compared with natural plants, it will not go rot, more beautiful and attractive.
